definitions: the failure of an organ (especially the liver or heart) to compensate for the functional overload resulting from disease.
shortDefinitions: failure of organ to compensate for functional overload resulting from disease

definitions: the failure to generate effective psychological coping mechanisms in response to stress, resulting in personality disturbance or disintegration, especially that which causes relapse in schizophrenia.
shortDefinitions: failure to generate effective psychological coping mechanisms in response to stress, resulting in personality disturbance or disintegration
